statements: DELETE FROM genomic_variation_data WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND position = 50000;
DELETE FROM genomic_variation_data WHERE chromosome='X' AND position > 1000 AND genotype='AA';

DELETE FROM Genomic_Variations WHERE chrom = 'chrX' AND position > 1000;
DELETE FROM DiseaseRiskPrediction WHERE PatientID = 100 AND PredictionDate = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM Individuals WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age > 50 OR ethnicity = 'Asian';
